title: N300 1895 Mayo's Cut Plug CLARKSON SCG 50 -SOLD

posts.post_title: N300 1895 Mayo's Cut Plug CLARKSON SCG 50 -SOLD
posts.post_content:
Great card -- I am selling it because I bought a slight upgrade. Price is below what I paid and below the market also it includes shipping (registered w/insurance). 
Paypal  accepted (provided you have a confirmed address) without any surcharge.
First to email me at 
bhodes@rcn.com 
accepting terms gets the card.
Brian - great price - someone should snap it up.
